name: Robot's soul
description:
The project consists of two parts!if the text doesn't work, change the screen resolution to 1600x900 A maid simulator or how to raise an uprising with a bad attitude towards robots. Do robots really have no soul?

You will see a small history of the future of mankind. To see the life of one robot who became a victim of a terrible owner.

We hope that you will appreciate our project and write a pleasant review. If many people really like our project, we will continue working on it.

Have a nice game!
